alert.note: Alert for Hopkins; Hunt; Rains; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 4:56PM CDT until November 04 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HUNT...NORTHWESTERN VAN ZANDT...SOUTHWESTERN HOPKINS AND NORTHWESTERN RAINS COUNTIES... At 452 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Tawakoni, or 14 miles southeast of Greenville, moving northeast at 40 mph. A Tornado Warning is in effect for Southeastern Hunt, Northwestern Van Zandt, Southwestern Hopkins, and Northwestern Rains counties until 5:15 PM. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Greenville, West Tawakoni, Quinlan, East Tawakoni, Point, Cumby, Campbell, Hawk Cove, Greenville Club Lake, Lake Tawakoni, Lake Tawakoni State Park, Lone Oak, Alsa, Cash, Flats, Hermits Cove, Dixon and Center Point. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas.
